column.name: post_id
column.remarks: Post ID on a given network.

column.name: author_user_id
column.remarks: User ID of favorited post author on a given network.

column.name: fav_of_user_id
column.remarks: User ID who favorited post on a given network.

column.name: network
column.remarks: Originating network in lower case, i.e., twitter or facebook.

column.name: fav_timestamp
column.remarks: Time post was favorited.

table.name: tu_follower_count
table.remarks: Follower counts by date and time.

column.name: network_user_id
column.remarks: User ID on a particular service with a follower count.

column.name: network
column.remarks: Originating network in lower case, i.e., twitter or facebook.

column.name: date
column.remarks: Date of follower count.

column.name: count
column.remarks: Total number of followers.

table.name: tu_follows
table.remarks: Service user follow and friend relationships.

column.name: user_id
column.remarks: User ID on a particular service who has been followed.

column.name: follower_id
column.remarks: User ID on a particular service who has followed user_id.

column.name: last_seen
column.remarks: Last time this relationship was seen on the originating network.

column.name: first_seen
column.remarks: First time this relationship was seen on the originating network.

column.name: active
column.remarks: Whether or not the relationship is active (1 if so, 0 if not.)

column.name: network
column.remarks: Originating network in lower case, i.e., twitter or facebook.

column.name: debug_api_call
column.remarks: Developer-only field for storing the API URL source of this data point.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID.

column.name: hashtag
column.remarks: Hash tag, i.e., #thinkup.

column.name: network
column.remarks: The network this hashtag appeared on in lower-case, e.g. twitter or facebook.

column.name: count_cache
column.remarks: A count of times this hashtag was captured.

column.name: post_id
column.remarks: Post ID on a given network.

column.name: hashtag_id
column.remarks: Internal hashtag ID.

column.name: network
column.remarks: The network this post appeared on in lower-case, e.g. twitter or facebook.

table.name: tu_instances
table.remarks: Authed network user for which ThinkUp archives data.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID.

column.name: network_user_id
column.remarks: User ID on a given network, like a user's Twitter ID or Facebook user ID.

column.name: network_viewer_id
column.remarks: Network user ID of the viewing user (which can affect permissions).

column.name: network_username
column.remarks: Username on a given network, like a user's Twitter username or Facebook user name.

column.name: last_post_id
column.remarks: Last network post ID fetched for this instance.

column.name: crawler_last_run
column.remarks: The last time the crawler completed a run for this instance.

column.name: total_posts_by_owner
column.remarks: Total posts by this instance as reported by service API.

column.name: total_posts_in_system
column.remarks: Total posts in datastore authored by this instance.

column.name: total_replies_in_system
column.remarks: Total replies in datastore authored by this instance.

column.name: total_follows_in_system
column.remarks: Total active follows where instance is the followed user.

column.name: posts_per_day
column.remarks: Average posts per day by instance.

column.name: posts_per_week
column.remarks: Average posts per week by instance.

column.name: percentage_replies
column.remarks: Percent of an instance's posts which are replies.

column.name: percentage_links
column.remarks: Percent of an instance's posts which contain links.

column.name: earliest_post_in_system
column.remarks: Date and time of the earliest post authored by the instance in the datastore.

column.name: earliest_reply_in_system
column.remarks: Date and time of the earliest reply authored by the instance in the datastore.

column.name: is_archive_loaded_replies
column.remarks: Whether or not all the instance's replies have been backfilled.

column.name: is_archive_loaded_follows
column.remarks: Whether or not all the instance's follows have been backfilled.

column.name: is_public
column.remarks: Whether or not instance is public in ThinkUp, that is, viewable when no ThinkUp user is logged in.

column.name: is_active
column.remarks: Whether or not the instance user is being actively crawled (0 if it is paused).

column.name: network
column.remarks: The lowercase name of the source network, i.e., twitter or facebook.

column.name: favorites_profile
column.remarks: Total instance favorites as reported by the service API.

column.name: owner_favs_in_system
column.remarks: Total instance favorites saved in the datastore.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID.

column.name: last_page_fetched_replies
column.remarks: Last page of replies fetched for this instance.

column.name: last_page_fetched_tweets
column.remarks: Last page of tweets fetched for this instance.

column.name: last_favorite_id
column.remarks: Last favorite post ID of the instance saved.

column.name: last_unfav_page_checked
column.remarks: Last page of older favorites checked for backfilling.

column.name: last_page_fetched_favorites
column.remarks: Last page of favorites fetched.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID.

column.name: url
column.remarks: Link URL as it appears inside the post, ie, shortened in tweets.

column.name: expanded_url
column.remarks: Link URL expanded from its shortened form.

column.name: title
column.remarks: Link title.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Link description.

column.name: image_src
column.remarks: URL of a thumbnail image associated with this link.

column.name: caption
column.remarks: Link or image caption.

column.name: clicks
column.remarks: Total known link clicks.

column.name: post_id
column.remarks: ID of the post which this link appeared on a given network.

column.name: network
column.remarks: Network of the post in which the link appeared.

column.name: error
column.remarks: Details of any error expanding a link.

table.name: tu_mentions
table.remarks: Mentions captured per user. One row per user.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID.

column.name: user_id
column.remarks: The user ID inside the respective service, e.g. Twitter or Facebook user IDs.

column.name: user_name
column.remarks: The user's name inside the respective service, e.g. Twitter or Facebook user name.

column.name: network
column.remarks: The network that this post belongs to in lower-case, e.g. twitter or facebook.

column.name: count_cache
column.remarks: A count of mentions a given user on a network has in the datastore.

column.name: post_id
column.remarks: Post ID on a given network.

column.name: author_user_id
column.remarks: Author user ID of the post which contains the mention on a given network.

column.name: mention_id
column.remarks: Internal mention ID.

column.name: network
column.remarks: The network which the mentioning post and mention comes from.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID.

column.name: full_name
column.remarks: User full name.

column.name: pwd
column.remarks: Hash of the owner password

column.name: pwd_salt
column.remarks: Salt for securely hashing the owner password

column.name: email
column.remarks: User email.

column.name: activation_code
column.remarks: User activation code.

column.name: joined
column.remarks: Date user registered for an account.

column.name: is_activated
column.remarks: If user is activated, 1 for true, 0 for false.

column.name: is_admin
column.remarks: If user is an admin, 1 for true, 0 for false.

column.name: last_login
column.remarks: Last time user logged into ThinkUp.

column.name: password_token
column.remarks: Password reset token.

column.name: failed_logins
column.remarks: Current number of failed login attempts.

column.name: account_status
column.remarks: Description of account status, i.e., "Inactive due to excessive failed login attempts".

column.name: api_key
column.remarks: Key to authorize API calls.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID.

column.name: place_id
column.remarks: Place ID on a given network.

column.name: place_type
column.remarks: Type of place.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Short name of a place.

column.name: full_name
column.remarks: Full name of a place.

column.name: country_code
column.remarks: Country code where the place is located.

column.name: country
column.remarks: Country where the place is located.

column.name: network
column.remarks: The network this place appears on in lower-case, e.g. twitter or facebook.

column.name: longlat
column.remarks: Longitude/lattitude point.

column.name: bounding_box
column.remarks: Bounding box of place.

table.name: tu_places_posts
table.remarks: Place where a post was published from. One row per post.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID.

column.name: longlat
column.remarks: Longitude/lattitude point.

column.name: post_id
column.remarks: Post ID on a given network.

column.name: place_id
column.remarks: Place ID on a given network.

column.name: network
column.remarks: The network this post appeared on in lower-case, e.g. twitter or facebook.

table.name: tu_post_errors
table.remarks: Errors in response to requests for post information.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID.

column.name: post_id
column.remarks: Post ID on the originating service.

column.name: network
column.remarks: Originating network in lower case, i.e., twitter or facebook.

column.name: error_code
column.remarks: Error code issues from the service.

column.name: error_text
column.remarks: Error text as supplied from the service.

column.name: error_issued_to_user_id
column.remarks: User ID service issued error to.

table.name: tu_posts
table.remarks: Posts by service users on a given network.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID..

column.name: post_id
column.remarks: The ID of the post inside the respective service.

column.name: author_user_id
column.remarks: The user ID inside the respective service, e.g. Twitter or Facebook user IDs.

column.name: author_username
column.remarks: The user's username inside the respective service, e.g. Twitter or Facebook user name.

column.name: author_fullname
column.remarks: The user's real, full name on a given service, e.g. Gina Trapani.

column.name: author_avatar
column.remarks: The URL to the user's avatar for a given service.

column.name: author_follower_count
column.remarks: Post author's follower count. [Twitter-specific]

column.name: post_text
column.remarks: The textual content of a user's post on a given service.

column.name: is_protected
column.remarks: Whether or not this post is protected, e.g. not publicly visible.

column.name: source
column.remarks: The client used to publish this post, e.g. if you post from the Twitter web interface, this will be "web".

column.name: location
column.remarks: Author-level location, e.g., the author's location as set in his or her profile. Use author-level location if post-level location is not set.

column.name: place
column.remarks: Post-level name of a place from which a post was published, ie, Woodland Hills, Los Angeles.

column.name: place_id
column.remarks: Post-level place ID on a given network.

column.name: geo
column.remarks: The post's latitude and longitude coordinates.

column.name: pub_date
column.remarks: The UTC date/time when this post was published.

column.name: in_reply_to_user_id
column.remarks: The ID of the user that this post is in reply to.

column.name: in_reply_to_post_id
column.remarks: The ID of the post that this post is in reply to.

column.name: reply_count_cache
column.remarks: The total number of replies this post received in the data store.

column.name: is_reply_by_friend
column.remarks: Whether or not this reply was authored by a friend of the original post's author.

column.name: in_retweet_of_post_id
column.remarks: The ID of the post that this post is a retweet of. [Twitter-specific]

column.name: old_retweet_count_cache
column.remarks: Manual count of old-style retweets as determined by ThinkUp. [Twitter-specific]

column.name: is_retweet_by_friend
column.remarks: Whether or not this retweet was posted by a friend of the original post's author. [Twitter-specific]

column.name: reply_retweet_distance
column.remarks: The distance (in km) away from the post that this post is in reply or retweet of [Twitter-specific-ish]

column.name: network
column.remarks: The network that this post belongs to in lower-case, e.g. twitter or facebook

column.name: is_geo_encoded
column.remarks: Whether or not this post has been geo-encoded.

column.name: in_rt_of_user_id
column.remarks: The ID of the user that this post is retweeting. [Twitter-specific]

column.name: retweet_count_cache
column.remarks: Manual count of native retweets as determined by ThinkUp. [Twitter-specific]

column.name: retweet_count_api
column.remarks: The total number of native retweets as reported by Twitter API. [Twitter-specific]

column.name: favlike_count_cache
column.remarks: The total number of favorites or likes this post received.

table.name: tu_stream_data
table.remarks: Unprocessed stream data. InnoDB for sel/del transactions.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID.

column.name: data
column.remarks: Raw stream data.

column.name: network
column.remarks: Originating network in lower case, i.e., twitter or facebook.

column.name: process_id
column.remarks: Stream process ID.

column.name: email
column.remarks: Email address of the user running the stream process.

column.name: instance_id
column.remarks: Internal instance ID receiving stream data.

column.name: last_report
column.remarks: Process heartbeat's last beat time.

table.name: tu_user_errors
table.remarks: Errors in response to requests for user information.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID.

column.name: user_id
column.remarks: User ID on a particular service.

column.name: error_code
column.remarks: Error code issues from the service.

column.name: error_text
column.remarks: Error text as supplied from the service.

column.name: error_issued_to_user_id
column.remarks: User ID service issued error to.

column.name: network
column.remarks: Originating network in lower case, i.e., twitter or facebook.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Internal unique ID.

column.name: user_id
column.remarks: User ID on a given network.

column.name: user_name
column.remarks: Username on a given network, like a user's Twitter username or Facebook user name.

column.name: full_name
column.remarks: Full name on a given network.

column.name: avatar
column.remarks: URL to user's avatar on a given network.

column.name: location
column.remarks: Service user location.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Service user description, like a Twitter user's profile description.

column.name: url
column.remarks: Service user's URL.

column.name: is_protected
column.remarks: Whether or not the user is public.

column.name: follower_count
column.remarks: Total number of followers a service user has.

column.name: friend_count
column.remarks: Total number of friends a service user has.

column.name: post_count
column.remarks: Total number of posts the user has authored.

column.name: last_updated
column.remarks: Last time this user's record was updated.

column.name: found_in
column.remarks: What data source or API call the last update originated from (for developer debugging).

column.name: last_post
column.remarks: The time of the latest post the user authored.

column.name: joined
column.remarks: When the user joined the network.

column.name: last_post_id
column.remarks: Network post ID of the latest post the user authored.

column.name: network
column.remarks: Originating network in lower case, i.e., twitter or facebook.

column.name: favorites_count
column.remarks: Total number of posts the user has favorited.
